original_text: So King Sennacherib of Assyria took his army away. He returned to Assyria and he lived in Nineveh. So King Sennacherib of Assyria took his army away. He returned to Assyria and he lived in Nineveh. So King Sennacherib of Assyria took his army away. He returned to Assyria and he lived in Nineveh.
korean_text: 이에 앗수르의 산헤립 왕이 떠나 돌아가서 니느웨에 거주하더니

sentences.original_text: So King Sennacherib of Assyria took his army away.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 앗수르의 산헤립 왕은 그의 군대를 물러갔습니다.
